backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata listing implemented features, related files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style setup defining OKLCH color variables and global light/dark theme rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the main ValentineProposalPage with CustomMediaProvider for shared state.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Audio player with play/mute controls, autoplay handling, and a button to open the customization panel.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationState: Celebration screen showing animated hearts, messages, feelings text, audio player, and photo collage.
frontend/src/components/CustomizeMediaPa: Modal for selecting photos, audio, and editing the feelings text, with apply/reset behavior and preview handling.
frontend/src/components/PhotoCollage.tsx: Displays three customizable photos in rotated polaroid-style frames with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/ValentineDecor.t: Renders background patterns, glitter overlays, and animated heart stickers for visual decoration.
Provides a context for managing and persisting custom photos, audio, and feelings text via IndexedDB with default fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasivePosition.ts: Provides randomized safe positions and handlers to move a button away on hover or touch.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required for this static page.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables plus animation utilities for the UI theme.
frontend/src/lib/customMediaStorage.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for saving, loading, and clearing photo, audio, and text Blobs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineProposalPage: Renders the main valentine proposal page with audio, photos, animations, and an evasive 'No' button.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state and feature requirements for adding a customizable feelings paragraph shown after clicking 'Yes'.
